medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse dull abdominal pain with eating and fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days ago with abdominal pain that is constant and dull in quality, moderate in severity. The pain starts in the upper belly and moves down to the lower belly, worse with eating and movement. The patient also reported a fever of 102.5 at home 2 days ago, which was treated with Tylenol. Currently, the patient is afebrile. She has experienced infrequent small and hard stools and took Ex-Lax with no relief.
